short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: define rules to modify a web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Define your own rules for what should happen to a web page. Remove elements matching a certain selector, remove classes from them, remove style properties. Download your rules and upload them. Generate links to share them with others.
